price: ߝߙߊߥߎ߲߫ ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߊ߬ߥߐ߫ ߸ ߊߟߎ ߞߍߕߐ߫ ߡߊ߬ߛߎ߬ߘߎ߲߬ߧߊ߬ߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߘߏ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߏ ߕߎ߬ߡߊ
arabic: قَالَ نَعَمۡ وَإِنَّكُمۡ إِذٗا لَّمِنَ ٱلۡمُقَرَّبِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qāla naʿam wa-innakum idhan lamina al-muqarabīna
translations: the ones who are brought near
